name: Tab-Options
description: Detects duplicate tabs, asks before closing duplicate tabs and focuses the existing one. Export and Import tabs

scripts.start: rimraf dev-build && parcel watch src/manifest.json --host localhost --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dev-build --no-cache
scripts.build: rimraf dist && parcel build src/manifest.json --config @parcel/config-webextension --dist-dir dist --no-cache --no-source-maps

author: iambluepie@gmail.com
